metadata.dc:author: ANTON-PACHECO, L
metadata.dc:subject: HEART/surgery
metadata.dc:title: Paro inducido del corazón en la circulación extracorpórea; experiencia sobre 20 casos de defectos interventriculares corregidos quirurgicamente.
[Induced arrest of the heart in extracorporeal circulation; experience on 20 cases of surgically corrected interventricular defects].
